comments.body: Could PyOpenSSL/cryptography be used here for data parsing rather than doing it manually ? `module_utils/crypto.py` or other crypto modules have example on how to be used.
I think this isn't parsing the certificate, but extracting the raw PEM file from the output generated by openssl's integrated s_client.

stdout = p.communicate(input=b'\n')[0]
data = stdout.decode()
